ygData.subject: Re: NEWBIE
ygData.msgSnippet: ... to ... I found starting out with a meele was easier.  Casters can be difficult until you get the hang of things.  Warriors, Rangers and Paladins are good
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "djsgibb" <gibb@a...> wrote:
> Hey everyone! I'm new to the EQ world and I'm looking for a place
to
> get started. Any tips for the server i should play on? Race and
> where i should dump my skills, IT would be more then appreacated!
> Shaun GIbb

I found starting out with a meele was easier. Casters can be
difficult until you get the hang of things. Warriors, Rangers and
Paladins are good for a beginning. SK's take some experience.

The PvP and roleplaying servers are also for more experienced
players, but you can dive in if you want. The game will be a little
harder to learn, but who knows? You may find a mentor!

And do try out several characters. And check out the EQ sites for
creations guides, unless you just want to go for it!

And most of all, have fun!

Tuldayen Grimblade
36th Season Ranger of Tunare
Terris-Thule
